product_name: belifAqua Bomb Depuffing Eye Gel with Caffeine + Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsThe belif Aqua Bomb Depuffing Eye Gel with Caffeine + Hyaluronic Acid is packed with caffeine and hyaluronic acid, the Korean skincare formula visibly depuffs tired-looking eyes, while the ceramic tip cools for an instant burst of energy.
details: DetailsBenefitsDeeply hydrates the eye areaVisibly depuffs tired-looking eyesPlumps fine linesBrightens dark circlesHelps improve the look of eye bags over timeDelivers an instant cooling sensationAllure 2025 Best of Beauty Skin WinnerKey IngredientsCaffeine and Hyaluronic Acid: Depuffs and delivers intense hydrationNiacinamide and Vitamin C: Visibly brightens dark circlesAdenosine and Clean Collagen: Visibly plumps and improves elasticityResearch ResultsClinically tested to depuff the eye areaClinically tested to reduce the appearance of eye bags and add volume to the under-eye area within 2 weeksClinically tested to plump the under-eye area within 2 weeksItem 2629445How To UsePress applicator pump down once or twice to release a pea-size dollop. Use ceramic tip to gently apply on under-eye area in circular motions from the inner to outer corners. Apply to eyelid area if desired. Lightly tap excess product and help it absorb into skin. Use morning and night.IngredientsWater, Propanediol, Glycerin, 1,2-hexanediol, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Sodium Carboxymethyl Starch, Butylene Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Betaine, Tromethamine, Sodium Polyacrylate, Allantoin, Lactobacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Melissa Officinalis Flower/Leaf/Stem Water*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Water*, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract*, Mentha Rotundifolia Leaf Extract*, Rosa Canina Fruit Extract*, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Leaf Extract*, Saccharomyces/Potato Extract Ferment Filtrate, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Saccharomyces/Barley Seed Ferment Filtrate, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Sodium Gluconate, Adenosine, Caffeine, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Cholesterol, Glutathione, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Alcohol Denat., Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Squalane, Desamido Collagen, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil+, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil+, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil+, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil+, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Citral, Linalool. *Belif Original Formula +Fragrances Of Botanical OriginShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Press applicator pump down once or twice to release a pea-size dollop. Use ceramic tip to gently apply on under-eye area in circular motions from the inner to outer corners. Apply to eyelid area if desired. Lightly tap excess product and help it absorb into skin. Use morning and night.
ingredients: Linalool. *Belif Original Formula +Fragrances Of Botanical Origin

reviews.headline: Absolutely amazing!
reviews.comments: I got this for my 16-year-old daughter, who has a hereditary puffy under-eye. It works wonders! Every time she uses it, someone asks her what she did differently with her eyes. I used it under my forty-some-year-old under eye. It's really wonderful, not greasy or shiny looking, but hydrating and very smoothing yet very lightweight. I certainly see brighter undereye when I use it, and if I'm using concealer, it sits smoothly over it. No irritation or itchy eyes, and I even use it for my upper eyelid too. I will definitely buy many more to stack up during the 50% sale on September 18th.

reviews.headline: Pointless eye gel
reviews.comments: I got a free sample of this in an Ulta gift with purchase and used the entire thing over the course if two months. I saw absolutely no difference in puffiness, dark circles, or texture. The only reason I didn't give it 1 star is that it is pleasant to apply and feels cooling. I guess it could work as an overpriced gel moisturizer for the eye area, but only if you need a light moisture. This does not deliver a lot of moisture. I liked it for day time but use something much thicker for night time. I have combo skin and am 42 with some fine lines, for what it's worth. I would never pay more than say $5-10 for this product.

reviews.headline: Good eye gel
reviews.comments: This id really good but i need like a jumbo soze this only lasts me like 3 months. My neutrogena one lasts me almost a year

reviews.headline: Game Changer for Under-eye Lines
reviews.comments: I'm in my 30's and have been struggljng with fine lines under my eyes, even with eye cream used twice daily. This formula is very lightweight, super hydrating, and has really softened the lines under my eyes. My under-eye skin looks smoother and more refreshed. I will absolutley be buying this again and again and again. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

reviews.headline: I would not buy this again
reviews.comments: It didn't work at all for the bags under my eyes

reviews.headline: Still wait the result
reviews.comments: To early to see any results, not seeing any

reviews.headline: LOVE!!
reviews.comments:
First received this as a trial size in one of those "spend x$ and get this free bag of goodies" and immediately fell in love. I already use Belif products (the moisturzing eye cream & moisturizing bomb face cream) so I'm already familiar with the brand, and this is now another item I'm keeping in my daily routine. 

It's a thin, clear gel and feels so refreshing in the morning. I love how quickly it absorbs into the skin so I can put it on whenever I want a little boost of moisture under my eyes. And it literally helps me look so much more awake in the morning! Idk how it does it but it does haha 

Again, love this product!! I've already bought it twice when on sale to stock up.

reviews.headline: Aqua Bomb Is the BOMB!
reviews.comments: Stopped in the Lisbon store. Was offered the credit card. Received a sample of Belif Aqua Bomb (first gift I've received from Ulta) Tried it out and saw emendate results. After a few days, dramatic, lasting improvement. Had to get more! Love it!

reviews.headline: I would not purchase again.
reviews.comments: I saw great reviews on this product. I purchased and used it. I'm not impressed. It didn't work for me the way people claimed it would. I see absolutely no difference before and after use or improvement over time.

reviews.headline: Burns eyes
reviews.comments: This burns really badly if you get it too close to your eye. This is also so thin it doesnt feel like its doing anything. Their other eye cream is much better.

reviews.headline: Absolute Must-Have in My Routine!
reviews.comments: I've never thought that eye creams I've tried varied much/had a ton of noticeable benefits from formula to formula until I found this one! Not sure if it's the ceramic applicator, the formula, or the perfect duo of both working together, but I notice a VISIBLE difference in the puffiness of my eyes when using this in the morning. Perfect for doing a gentle massage around the eye/brow bone area when I have a tension headache from staring at a screen as well. Absolutely love this and have recommended to everyone I know!

reviews.headline: Moisturizes but that's it
reviews.comments: I've been using this once a day everyday for 4 months now. I can say it's an okay product. It moisturizes well enough but that's about it. Doesn't help with puff, color, or lines. I never felt a "cooling" effect. Just feels like a regular room temperature product.

reviews.headline: Great until it broke
reviews.comments: I actually loved this eye cream while it was usable. I've been dealing with really puffy eyes due to allergies and this really helped reduce the swelling in the mornings. I kept it in the box in the refrigerator and would follow up with some ice rollers after. However, after about a week and a half of use, I accidentally dropped the box on the floor. When I opened it up, the applicator tip had snapped off. It's completely useless now. Very disappointing for a product that is not cheap.

reviews.headline: Doesn't de-puff
reviews.comments: Bought this product to help de-puff my under-eyes and it did nothing. Don't waste your money on this.

reviews.headline: So good, wow
reviews.comments:
I (23f very fair skin) have tried a lot of products for my dark circles and nothing worked until this eye gel.
 In just a few days I noticed the brightening effects, with the darkness and fine veins in my undereyes almost invisible.
It depuffs within about 10min and with consistent morning and evening use my undereyes stay in good shape. 
Not much concealer is necessary anymore and I hope to improve enough to not have to wear that makeup. The only caution would be what's expected, don't get it directly in the eyes because it'll burn pretty badly.

It's doing a great job healing my skin after I wasn't in the best health. This stuff is worth every penny.

reviews.headline: Good serum good for depuffing and tightening
reviews.comments: Ive been using this for a month now with the eye cream. Ive use the eye cream for a while love it and now using the serum ive seen a good difference in my under eye area. My under eye is less dark and the lines under my eyes have soften. I also find this is a good depuffer for the morning

reviews.headline: Good serum good for depuffing and tightening
reviews.comments: Ive been using this for a month now with the eye cream. Ive use the eye cream for a while love it and now using the serum ive seen a good difference in my under eye area. My under eye is less dark and the lines under my eyes have soften. I also find this is a good depuffer for the morning

reviews.headline: Love!!
reviews.comments: I use this twice a day and have for a week. I can see a huge difference already! I have a line under both eyes that is now almost all gone. I use this 2x per day as directed, and feels so nice!! The smell is nice and not overwhelming which is a plus as well.

reviews.headline: Very cooling and plumping
reviews.comments: I started using this almost a month ago. I have terrible dark circles and saw that i have fine lines as well. I didn't see a difference in dark circles, though saw that my under eyes are more plump and healthy looking. Results were not instant. Took come time. But it has a cooling sensation I like. It's thick and won't absorb quickly though. Not well under the make up. But would use it some more and see if it helps with dark circles.

reviews.headline: amazing!
reviews.comments: this is a great product. i love the cooling ceramic tip and the component that the product is in. it's a lightweight gel formula that absorbs quickly into the eye area. being someone who's used countless eye creams and gels ovee the years, this is the first product where i was able to see and immediate difference! my undereyes were drastically less puffy after the first usage. i look forward to see what the results will look like with continued use!

faceoff_positive.comments: As usual with Belif, all their products are amazing and I am once again sad I can't live without a pricey product lol. I've always suffered from bad dark circles from being pale, having deep set eyes, and thin skin in that area. I have tried countless vitamin c, retinol, other brightening products that made zero difference because I realized the issue is not discolored skin for me, the area is sunken and needs to be plumped. Caffeine and hyaluronic acid products seem to be the only thing that helps fill the area. I have tried the Yerba eye gel as well, but did not notice much difference. I can see a significant visible difference using this within an hour. The photos are before/after of only one use with an hour time difference, I imagine the results will be even better after a few weeks.
faceoff_positive.headline: Immediate results

faceoff_negative.comments: I got a free sample of this in an Ulta gift with purchase and used the entire thing over the course if two months. I saw absolutely no difference in puffiness, dark circles, or texture. The only reason I didn't give it 1 star is that it is pleasant to apply and feels cooling. I guess it could work as an overpriced gel moisturizer for the eye area, but only if you need a light moisture. This does not deliver a lot of moisture. I liked it for day time but use something much thicker for night time. I have combo skin and am 42 with some fine lines, for what it's worth. I would never pay more than say $5-10 for this product.
faceoff_negative.headline: Pointless eye gel

rollup.name: Aqua Bomb Depuffing Eye Gel with Caffeine + Hyaluronic Acid
